info.+content: Kinnikuman
Kinnikuman El Hombre Músculos
M.U.S.C.L.E.
Mr. Muscleman
Muscleman
キン肉マン
adventure
comedy
science fiction
tournament
TA

Kinnikuman is a superhero...a bad one. The one day a person named Meat tells Kinnikuman that he is the prince of an alien planet. Kinnikuman must save the day numerous times fighting evil chōjin and competing in tournaments to prove himself to his family and to gain respect and money.
1991-04-05 (TV3 - Televisió de Catalunya)
"Mr. Muscleman" by Bernard Minet [French version]
#1: "Kinnikuman Go Fight!" (キン肉マンGo Fight!) by Akira Kushida (eps 1-65)
#2: "Honō no Kinnikuman" (炎のキン肉マン; "Blazing Kinnikuman") by Akira Kushida, Koorogi '73, and SHINES (eps 66-124)
#3: "Kinnikuman Senpū (Sensation)" (キン肉マン旋風!) by Akira Kushida (eps 125-137)
#1: "Niku 2×9 Rock 'n Roll" by Akira Kushida, Akira Kamiya, and Tetsuo Mizutori (eps 1-65)
#2: "Kinniku Mambo" (キン肉マンボ) by Akira Kamiya, Koorogi '73, and SHINES (eps 66-96, 107-124)
#3: "Kinnikuman Ondo" (キン肉マン音頭) by Akira Kamiya, Minori Matsushima, Koorogi '73, and SHINES (eps 97-106)
#4: "Kinnikuman Club" (キン肉マン倶楽部) by Akira Kamiya (eps 125-137)
"Akadō Suzunosuke no Uta" (赤胴鈴之助の歌) by Mitsuo Kaneko (ep 56)
"Akuma no Mōgyū" (悪魔の猛牛) by Takayuki Miyauchi (eps 81-82,86)

"Asia no Ōkami" (アジアの狼) by Yōji Saitō (ep 108)
"Chakkiri Bushi" (ちゃっきり節) by Issei Futamata (ep 30)
"Dohyō no Eiyū" (土俵の英雄) by Akira Kushida (ep 69)
"Gekkō Kamen wa Dare Deshō" (月光仮面は誰でしょう) by Yoshiko Kondō (ep 56)
"Hakuba Dōji" (白馬童子) by Kuranosuke Hamaguchi (ep 56)
"Kanashimi no Bear Claw" (悲しみのベアークロー) by Woo (eps 62,72,75)
"Kiseki no Gyakuten Fighter" (奇跡の逆転ファイター) by Akira Kamiya (eps 71,83)
"Kung Fu Fighter" (カンフーファイター) by Koorogi '73 (ep 109)
"Kyōdai Jingi" (兄弟仁義) by Koji Totani (eps 14,62)
"Megumi no Hito" (め組のひと) by Rats & Star (ep 42)
"Mr. Muscleman - Qui Est Le Plus Fort?" by Bernard Denimal [French version]
"Ride of the Valkyries" (Walkürenritt) by Richard Wagner (ep 16)
"See You Again, Hero!" by Akira Kamiya (eps 59,65,69)
"Texas Bronco" (テキサスブロンコ) by Akira Kushida (eps 59,99)
"Tsuki" (月) by Tetsuo Mizutori (ep 7)
"Yuke Yuke Hyūma" (ゆけゆけ飛雄馬) by Takeo Watanabe (ep 98)
"Yuke! Tiger Mask" (行け!タイガーマスク) by Hideyo Morimoto (ep 45)
"Yume Shibai" (夢芝居) by Tomio Umezawa (ep 73)
